short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds the ability to *page down/up* all of your Mastodon columns in the Advanced Web UI (if you are using that setting).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PageDown for Mastodon is a small utility that lets you "PageDown"/"PageUp" all of your Mastodon columns simultaneously, via hotkeys.
This makes it super quick and easy to catch up on missed posts.
The hotkeys are: "u" for PageUp, "i" for PageDown, "o" to jump to top, "\" to toggle (enable/disable) hotkeys.
Note: This extension works on the top ~40 servers.
If you are on a small server (self-hosted or on a server with under 15K users), you will want to load this extension differently. Visit www.metafruit.com/pagedown for more info.
